response.overview: If you’re looking for an effective resource that will teach your children about dinosaurs and the Bible, then this is the DVD for you!  These days, most people don’t have sufficient answers when it comes to the topic of dinosaurs and how they fit with Biblical history. This show puts an end to that problem once and for all. Find out where dinosaurs came from and when they lived. Find out what they ate and why they no longer roam the earth today…or do they?  Watch the T.R.U.T.H. Group as they proceed to ‘take the dinosaurs back’ from the secular, evolutionary minded culture that we find ourselves living in today. An educational, entertaining documentary. It’s the first of its kind…  an EDU-TAIN-MENTARY!  Features special interviews with Mike Riddle, Frank Sherwin, Dennis Swift, Gary Kanter, and Ray Comfort in the T.R.U.T.H. About the Dinosaurs DVD.
response.tagline: Watch the T.R.U.T.H. Group as they proceed to ‘take the dinosaurs back’ from the secular, evolutionary minded culture that we find ourselves living in today.
response.title: T.R.U.T.H. about the Dinosaurs
